name: CHAOS_ENABLED
description: indicates whether to execute registered chaos experiments

name: CHAOS_SCHEDULED_TIMEOUT_MILLIS
description: the number of milliseconds to wait before executing an experiment

name: GLOBAL_ERROR_COUNT_THRESHOLD
description: the maximum number of errors a module may report before the application core attempts to recover the module

name: JWT_SECRET
description: the secret used to sign new JSON Web Tokens

name: JWT_TOKEN_EXPIRATION_MILLIS
description: time in milliseconds until a JSON Web Token expires

name: LOG_LEVEL
description: indicates whether to display `console` messages on stdout. Used to declutter console output during test runs
